DOC.brief_summary: Design: Observational - Cross study with followed up for 30 days. The Primary Objective is to realize a record that reflects a national overview of the role of cardiac catheterization in patients with congenital heart disease in hospitals distributed by geographic density of each region of Brazil.
DOC.brief_title: CHAIN_brazilian Registry of Congenital HeArt Disease INtervention and Angiography
DOC.detailed_description: Patients admitted in the hemodynamic sector with diagnosed or suspected congenital cardiopathy and undergoing diagnostic or therapeutic cardiac catheterization. Participants release the data in (e-CRF) electronics system. Sample: 2000 records.
DOC.criteria: Patients admitted to the hemodynamic sector with diagnosed or suspected congenital cardiopathy and undergoing diagnostic or therapeutic cardiac catheterization. Patients undergoing hybrid approach to intervention, with the aid of cardiac surgery to realization of cardiac catheterization.
